#summary Describes what to do if you have a question or a problem
#labels Order-999
= Ask a Question or Report a Problem =

If you have an issue that isn't addressed in the [FAQ], please:

 # Search through the existing user-reported issues.
 # If you find your issue and it solves your problem, you're done.
 # If you find your issue and have something to add, please add a comment to it.
 # If your issue is not already described, then create a new issue.

Search [http://code.google.com/p/battery-indicator/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Type%20label:Question%20&sort=priority&colspec=ID%20Type%20Status%20Priority%20Summary existing questions].

Search [http://code.google.com/p/battery-indicator/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Type%20label:Defect%20&sort=priority&colspec=ID%20Type%20Status%20Priority%20Summary existing problems].
